verbs.description: [ARG0: south african finance minister] [V: resigns] [ARGM-TMP: after graft testimony south africa finance minister resigned on tuesday after acknowledging missteps during the scandal - tainted tenure of former president jacob zuma the resignation of nhlanhla nene was announced by president cyril ramaphosa who has pledged to clean up corruption and revive south africa economy which is in recession the president appointed tito mboweni former head of the south african reserve bank as the new minister and told him to be ready for a cabinet meeting on wednesday zuma south african reserve bank cyril ramaphosa south africa president cyril ramaphosa nhlanhla nene deputy president president finance minister]
